attributes.action: ensure that all ministers of state wear clown costumes for all public appearances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increasingly politicians give the false impression to people that government  can change and influence anything for the better. By its very nature government can at the best do stupid things and make us all laugh. To encourage government ministers in the honest pursuit of laughter the wearing of clown costumes should be compulsory.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
